about_the_game:
Embark on a riveting found footage adventure in 'Valince Genesis: VR,' immersing yourself in the role of Detective Sinclair. What begins as a routine investigation takes an unexpected turn when Detective Sinclair finds himself at the opulent Crimson View Hotel, within its luxurious walls. Navigate through a captivating storyline filled with twists and turns as you strive to uncover the truth behind a mysterious disappearance and unveil the secrets that shroud this intriguing tale. Immerse yourself in a game where every decision matters, and the line between reality and the unknown blurs in this gripping cinematic experience. Explore, investigate, and decide your path as you face the challenges that lie ahead in 'Valince Until Dawn.'

Using guns and other "tools," you will gain access to the secrets of the Crimson View Hotel. Can you make it out alive? Featuring a fully voiced cast and a progress-based system, gain the power you need to escape.

content_descriptors.notes: It is a found footage vampire game.  Warning: there is intense violence and very limited nudity that is only found within in-game  comics.
